type: English: Financial Accounting Services for Health Canada’s Inventory of Rapid Tests
short_summary: Health Canada requires financial accounting services for the inventory of rapid tests stored in the warehouse. The vendor will have 18 months to perform the services pursuant to this contract. Contract start date: Not specified, Contract end date: Not specified”,
description: This amendment amends the requirement for Health Canada’s Inventory of Rapid Tests and adds a new requirement for financial accounting services for the inventory of rapid tests stored in the warehouse.
